metadata.name: warmth
metadata.description:
There are times when love is fleeting. So fleeting that it may be forgotten the next morning. 

A glance, a touch, a tender embrace. Breaths colliding, heartbeats harmonising, caught in each other's gravity. 

Sometimes that's all it takes to warm the night away. 

---


This piece is derived from my 5th single [Seethala Yahana](https://youtu.be/-U18X8K7yLs), which in my native tongue of Sinhala means "beds that are cold".
